languages.text: "Но отыскать корни нечистоты не сможет ни ткач, ни доблестный воин из свиты Домин. Ибо умеет она в облике человека прятаться, вести себя, как человек, и лишь совращенные мысли ее выдают — не такие. Нечеловеческие".

"But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."
languages.original_text: "Но отыскать корни нечистоты не сможет ни ткач, ни доблестный воин из свиты Домин. Ибо умеет она в облике человека прятаться, вести себя, как человек, и лишь совращенные мысли ее выдают — не такие. Нечеловеческие".

traits.locale_text: "But no weaver or brave warrior from the Enim's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

"But no weaver or brave warrior from the Enim's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

"But no weaver or brave warrior from the Enim's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

"But no weaver or brave warrior from the Enim's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

"But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

"But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

languages.text: «Pero ningún tejedor ni valeroso guerrero del círculo de{mf|l| la} Domin puede dar con la raíz de la impureza, pues toma forma humana y actúa como tal. Tan solo sus pensamientos revelan su vileza. Sus pensamientos son lo único que nunca parece humano».
languages.original_text: "But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ningún tejedor ni valeroso guerrero del círculo de{mf|l| la} Domin puede dar con la raíz de la impureza, pues toma forma humana y actúa como tal. Tan solo sus pensamientos revelan su vileza. Sus pensamientos son lo único que nunca parece humano».

languages.text: 「しかし、ドミンの輪から来た紡績工や勇敢な戦士は、穢れの根源を見つけることができない。人間の姿で、人間のように行動するからな。その下劣な本性を裏切るのは、その思考だけだ。その思考だけが決して人間ではないのだ」
languages.original_text: "But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、エニムの輪から来たウィーヴァーや勇敢な戦士は、穢れの根源を見つけることができない。人間の姿で、人間のように行動するからな。その下劣な本性を裏切るのは、その思考だけだ。その思考だけが決して人間ではないのだ」

languages.text: “然而，无论是织网者，还是秘者身边的勇士，都无法找到污秽之物的根源，因为它们的外表与行为和人类没有任何区别。只有它的思想会暴露它邪恶的本性，只有它的思想才与人类大相径庭。”
languages.original_text: "But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

traits.locale_text: “然而，无论是织网者，还是秘者身边的勇士，都无法找到污秽之物的根源，因为它们的外表与行为和人类没有任何区别。只有它的思想会暴露它邪恶的本性，只有它的思想才与人类大相径庭。”

languages.text: "Doch kein Spinner oder mutiger Krieger aus dem Kreis {mf|des|der} Domin kann die Wurzeln des Unsauberen finden, denn es kann als Mensch erscheinen und als Mensch handeln. Nur seine Gedanken verraten sein schändliches Wesen. Nur seine Gedanken sind niemals menschlich."
languages.original_text: "But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

traits.locale_text: "Doch kein Spinner oder mutiger Krieger aus dem Kreis {mf|des|der} Domin kann die Wurzeln des Unsauberen finden, denn es kann als Mensch erscheinen und als Mensch handeln. Nur seine Gedanken verraten sein schändliches Wesen. Nur seine Gedanken sind niemals menschlich."

languages.text: « Pour autant, ni les tisseurs ni les braves guerriers au service {mf|du|de la} Domin ne peuvent identifier les racines de l'abjection, car elle se cache derrière une apparence et un comportement humains. Seules ses pensées trahissent sa nature impie. Seules ses pensées n'ont rien de commun avec l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."

traits.locale_text: « Pour autant, ni les tisseurs ni les braves guerriers au service {mf|du|de la} Domin ne peuvent identifier les racines de l'abjection, car elle se cache derrière une apparence et un comportement humains. Seules ses pensées trahissent sa nature impie. Seules ses pensées n'ont rien de commun avec l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Ancak Domin'in çevresindeki dokurlar da cesur savaşçılar da günahkârlığın köküne inemez. Zira onun görüntüsü de davranışları da insanı andırır. Salt fikirleri, habis duasına ihanet eder. Salt fikirleri, insanlığı hiç tatmamıştır."
languages.original_text: "But no spinner or brave warrior from the Domin's circle can find the roots of the unclean, for it can appear as human and act as human. Only its thoughts betray its vile nature. Only its thoughts are never human."
